steps.caption: Crowd of people near motorcycles and bicycles.

edit_instructions: Provide a more specific caption that includes the number of people and the types of vehicles.

Give minimal hints only.

missing_objects, hallucinated_objects, genericity_hint, edit_instructions, score (0-10)
No other keys.
